snippet: Tyson Chandler said Knicks players would have to play roles they were not necessarily used to in the absence of the team's two stars, a statement that may best apply to him.
abstract: Tyson Chandler said Knicks players would have to play roles they were not necessarily used to in the absence of the team's two stars, a statement that may best apply to him.

headline.main: Knicks May Need to See Chandler's Offensive Side
